channel.title: Project-Insanity Skillcape Emote Problem

item.title: Project-Insanity Skillcape Emote Problem
item.dc:creator: @_icestorm ~*icestorm*~
item.description:
@_icestorm wrote:

Ok so I have been using this code for my Attack Skillcape Emote. When Ever I do the Emote it Plays the Anim But the the Gfx. Whats wrong with it?
[code]public void SkillCape() {

if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerCape] == 9748) {
stillGfx(823, c.absY, c.absX, 0, 0);
c.startAnimation(4959);

c.playerLevel[0] = getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[0]);
c.playerLevel[0] += 1;
sendFrame126(""+c.playerLevel[0]+"", 4016);
c.updateRequired = true;
c.setAppearanceUpdateRequired(true);

}
}[/code]

Read full topic
